overview_of_class: Washington Reporting on Politics and Government provides students full-time reporting experience covering Congress, the White House and federal agencies for a daily newspaper or Web site; the course emphasizes enterprise reporting, visual journalism and computer-assisted reporting skills.
name: Washington Reporting: Covering the Nation's News Capital
subject: JOUR
